Class AemFieldset

    public class AemFieldset
extends Object
implements FieldContainer
    Represents fieldset in a AemDialog.

      • isFolded

        public boolean isFolded()
        Returns:
        State of the fieldset. True means folded, false means expanded.

      • isExpanded

        public boolean isExpanded()
        Returns:
        State of the fieldset. True means expanded, false means folded.
